name: NATIONAL PARK LEGEND:BIGFOOT
description:
There is a legendary creature you can hunt for now! The search for the elusive BIGFOOT has never been more action packed or more realistic! Discover the environment, use your flashlight ot night vision googles to see in the darkness. Also you can change weapon. Go and pull the trigger on good place in good time!


Features:
-map selection
-large selection of weapons
-night vision goggles
-big areas
